wikipedia_page.main: Mallik Rashaun Coley Wilks (born 15 December 1998) is an English professional footballer who plays as a forward for EFL Championship club Hull City. He can play as a winger or as a striker.

response: Maddison signed a six-month loan deal with Hull City on 31 January 2020. He made his debut for Hull on 1 February 2020, when he came on as a substitute for Mallik Wilks in the 1–5 home defeat to Brentford.
